name: Safi cushion - large with hessian
description:
These gorgeous cushions have been lovingly handmade by Mama Veronica in Arusha, Tanzania.

1 medium with hessian available - 45cm x 45cm SOLD OUT
1 large with hessian available - 55cm x 55cm

100% cotton.

Mama Kubwa (Big Mama in Swahili) is a socially conscious business designed to give women in Arusha, Tanzania, an opportunity to rise above poverty. Each mama we work with is paid a fair wage for the goods they produce, enabling them to support their families and achieve a sustainable business operation. 

Buy Mama Kubwa because you love it. Feel good about your purchase because you're supporting a positive change for women in Tanzania.

All cushion covers are sold without inserts. If you would like inserts with your cushions please contact Mama Kubwa and we will calculate postage.
